# ESPHOME App for Home Assistant
[![Buy me a coffee](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/buttons/bmc-new-btn-logo.svg)](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/jumping)<span style="margin-left:15px;font-size:28px !important;">Buy me a coffee</span></a>

ESPHome app for Home Assistant [jumping2000](https://github.com/jumping2000/esphome/commits?author=jumping2000)<br>

*Esphome apps works with ESPhome addon or ESPhome environment  

## Installation
Use [ADDON](https://github.com/esphome/home-assistant-addon) or [CONTAINER](hhttps://hub.docker.com/r/esphome/esphome) and go!
